Package com.opower.hadoop.hbase.selector

An abstraction from HBase's native Filter that inverts the contract.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Selector Inverses the contract of an HBase Filter so that it is more easily understood.
 

Class Summary
AbstractKeyValueSelector An abstract base class for Selectors that focus on the key/value only.
AbstractRowSelector An abstract base class for making Selectors that are based only on the row key
AbstractStatelessSelector A base class to extend when the Selector you want to write has no state and thus does not need specific implementations of the Writable methods.
RowKeyInSetSelector A Selector that checks for the existence of a row key in a set, giving functionality similar to that of an "in" clause in SQL.
SelectorFilter Adapts a Selector to fit the contract of a Filter.
 

Package com.opower.hadoop.hbase.selector Description

An abstraction from HBase's native Filter that inverts the contract. The intent of this abstraction is to make writing simple filters easier. It is not intended to fully replace the Filter interface, which is clearly designed for performance, given HBase's unique data access patterns.
